context: Your insurance policy covers the following: 1. Medical expenses up to $1,000,000. 2. Accidental damage to property up to $500,000. 3. Liability coverage up to $2,000,000. To file a claim, visit our claims portal or call our support team at 1-800-123-4567. Your monthly premium is $150.

questions.What is covered under my policy?: Your policy covers medical expenses, accidental damage to property, and liability coverage.
questions.How do I file a claim?: You can file a claim by visiting our claims portal or calling our support team at 1-800-123-4567.
